root.name: Moto Racer 3
root.description: OverviewMoto Racer 3 is the third game released in the Moto Racer franchise. It was one of the last titles developed by Delphine Software International. It was released originally on the PC in 2002. It was released onto the Good Old Games service on January 5, 2011.

similar_games.game: Suzuki TT Superbikes Real Road Racing
